mapper.select: SELECT id, logical_name AS logicalName, stored_name AS storedName, stored_path AS storedPath, extension AS extension, size AS size FROM free_attachments WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_attachments (logical_name, stored_name, stored_path, extension, size, post_id) VALUES (#{logicalName}, #{storedName}, #{storedPath}, #{extension}, #{size}, #{freePost.id});
